about_the_game:
What is the game about:

Welcome to AI Asylum, a haunting asylum teeming with enigmatic individuals who guard their secrets with an iron grip.

Your mission? Earn the trust of the enigmatic female special agent, Nora, the mystic cat girl, Mio, and other patients as you delve into their deepest, most sinister truths.

What you need to do is explore the scenes of the character, then find key items, and obtain crucial information by conversing with the character.

This information can assist you in completing the task. But beware, not everyone is as they appear, and peril lurks around every corner, inappropriate questions or actions may provoke the character and result in mission failure.

Key features:

  • AI-powered puzzle duels: Alone in a dark room, you'll face off against characters with unique personalities. Solve intricate puzzles and outsmart them in a battle of wits to escape with your life!

  • AI Character Editor: Craft your own unique personas. Choose from a wide array of models and environments to bring your chilling narrative to life, then share your meticulously designed characters with fellow adventurers.

  • Dive into Storylines: Get ready to dive deep into the lives of your favorite characters and experience their thrilling stories like never before. Discover the all-new personal tales of Nora, Mio, John, Witch Sources, and the Puppet Princess!

content_descriptors.notes: This game has some adult content that may not be suitable for all age groups of players. It contains Frequent violence and gore, as well as mature content and bloody scenes. The ghosts and monsters in the game will perform mild violent attacks on the player. There are some jumpscare scenes containing bloody and frightening imagery, and in-game objects will also make people feel disgusted.

What is the game about:

Welcome to AI Asylum, a haunting asylum teeming with enigmatic individuals who guard their secrets with an iron grip.

Your mission? Earn the trust of the enigmatic female special agent, Nora, the mystic cat girl, Mio, and other patients as you delve into their deepest, most sinister truths.

  • AI-powered puzzle duels: Alone in a dark room, you'll face off against characters with unique personalities. Solve intricate puzzles and outsmart them in a battle of wits to escape with your life!

  • AI Character Editor: Craft your own unique personas. Choose from a wide array of models and environments to bring your chilling narrative to life, then share your meticulously designed characters with fellow adventurers.

name: AI Asylum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“Interesting Escape Room Project - Talk to your captivator present objects and earn their trust through entirely open dialogue”
AnimeTiddiesConnoisseur

“AI Asylum' is a mystery adventure game with horror element..interrogate suspects, gather information, make the right choice..or trigger bad endings! Customisable and interesting chatacters, neat!”
Gaming Grandma

“Immerse yourself in realm of madness & bone-chilling terror, step into gripping horror, crafted to send shivers down your spine. Explore a nightmarish world, each step unveils sinister secrets.”
RECOMMENDED
short_description: Immerse yourself in a realm of madness and bone-chilling terror as you step into our gripping horror adventure, meticulously crafted to send shivers down your spine. Explore a nightmarish world where each step unveils sinister secrets and heart-pounding encounters.
